posts.post_title: Looking to Buy Black and White T209s
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Eric S.
Forque - Rocky Mt. (This card is super nice)

Turner - Raleigh (Slight paper loss on the front edges.  Not from tape though.  Few small creases)

Pritchard / Pressley - Roanoke (creases)



[IMG]http://i551.photobucket.com/albums/ii477/tao_moko/Contentnea004.jpg[/IMG]

This is the first time I've posted pictures on Photobucket so let me know if they're not all clear.  I'm open to potential trade or sell.

Thanks,

Eric
